title: Hear Lil Uzi Vert's Woozy New Song 'Uppin Downers' - Rolling Stone

organizations.name: rolling stone hear lil uzi vert

text:
Hear Lil Uzi Vert's Woozy New Song 'Uppin Downers' "'Luv is Rage 2' coming soon" Philly MC writes 
Lil Uzi Vert rides a rollercoaster of highs and lows on his new song "Uppin Downers." Related PHOTOS: 40 Best Rap Albums of 2016 Kanye West, Chance the Rapper, Danny Brown and more in the year in rhymes 
On the DJ Plugg-produced track, Uzi relays a woozy drug pattern, where taking one pill inevitably leads to another. "I was on Addy to keep me up/ I was on Xanny to bring me down," he raps. "I was on molly to keep me up/ I was on 30s to bring me down." 
He also discusses how the habit has led to blacking out in a Ferrari and dictates what he chooses to do. "I don't want to go if it's not no pills there," he confesses. 
Though the Philly MC has not yet revealed when his forthcoming mixtape Luv is Rage 2 will be released, he wrote that it will be "coming soon" on SoundCloud, where he first posted "Uppin Downers." It has since been deleted. 
Lil Uzi Vert's The Perfect LUV Tape made Rolling Stone 's " 40 Best Rap Albums of 2016 ." The rapper also appears on Migos' current Number One track, " Bad and Boujee ." More News
